item.title: About
item.description: Casey Bates is a Senior Technical Consultant at ERM and an Instructor at DataCamp.

item.title: Data Cleaning and Exploration
item.description: Data A single-family home sales dataset and a condo/townhome dataset for Garfield County, Colorado, that contain 2 years of data from summer 2014 through summer 2016. The data is publically available on the Garfield County Assessor website. # This chunk includes the data processing steps to wrangle and clean the data library(tidyverse) # For reading-in, wrangling, visualizing the data, and for pipe operator library(readxl) # Tidyverse package for reading in Excel files library(magrittr) # For the '%<>%' pipe operator library(knitr) # For nicely formatted tables # Read-in townhomes and condo sales data townhomes <- read_xlsx("2017-comparable-sales-condos-townhomes.

item.title: Fitting models with purrr and broom
item.description: Motivation Utilize tidyverse tools and the broom package to generate numerous linear models to evaluate how well sale price is explained by square footage for home sales in Garfield County, Colorado. A dataset is publically available on the Garfield County Assessor website that contains 2 years of data from summer 2014 through summer 2016. # This chunk includes the data processing steps to wrangle and clean the data library(tidyverse) # For reading-in, wrangling, visualizing the data, and for pipe operator library(readxl) # Tidyverse package for reading in Excel files library(magrittr) # For the '%<>%' pipe operator # Read-in townhomes and condo sales data townhomes <- read_xlsx("2017-comparable-sales-condos-townhomes.
